Her father is a Lebanese while her mom is a Columbian, thus she has both Latino and Arabic heritage.
Shakira was once the one daughter of her mom as well as the ninth child of her father.
data.text:
Shakira is a Grammy-Award successful Colombian Singer, Songwriter, Record Producer and Dancer who is considered the highest-selling Colombian artist of all time.

Shakira Biography

Shakira Isabel Mebarak Ripoll used to be born on 2 February 1977, in Barranquilla, Colombia, to Nidia del Carmen Ripoll Torrado and William Mebarak Chadid. Her father is a Lebanese while her mom is a Columbian, thus she has both Latino and Arabic heritage.

Shakira was once the one daughter of her mom as well as the ninth child of her father. She has eight half-siblings including; JosÃ© Antonio Mebarack, Lucy Mebarack, Patricia Mebarack, Ana and Edward Mebarack, Robin Mebarack Otero, Moises Mebarack Otero, Toni Mebarack, and Alberto William Mebarack.

When Shakira used to be two years outdated, her eldest half-brother was killed in a motorcycle twist of fate.

As in step with her tutorial background, Shakira attended La Ensenanza School, in Barranquilla. She proceeded to get her tertiary schooling on the University of California, Los Angeles however dropped out in the end.

Shakira began writing poetry on the age of 4 and would typically entertain his academics and friends at school via dancing. She wrote her first track at the age of 8 and signed her first file deal at 13.

Shakira has long past forward to develop into a successful musician and has two Grammy Awards as well as 8 Latin Grammy Awards to her identify.

Shakira has a net worth of $three hundred million which she has been able to acquire from her a success music gross sales.

Shakira Husband

Shakira is currently not married however is in a relationship with Spanish soccer player Gerard PiquÃ© whom he began relationship in 2010 once they met on the set of her âWaka Wakaâ music video.

The couple welcomed their first child, a son named Milan PiquÃ© Mebarak, on January 22, 2013. On 29 January 2015, Shakira gave start to their second son, Sasha.
